All Classes

  • Class Description
    Colors  
    Colors.ColorSequencer  
    Dct1d
    Interface specifying all one-dimensional DCT implementations.
    Dct1d.Double  
    Dct1d.Float  
    Dct1dDirect
    This class calculates the 1D DFT using tabulated cosine values.
    Dct1dDirect.Double  
    Dct1dDirect.Float  
    Dct1dFast
    Fast implementation of the DCT, based on the JTransforms package by Piotr Wendykier (see https://github.com/wendykierp/JTransforms).
    Dct1dFast.Double  
    Dct1dFast.Float  
    Dct1dSlow
    This class calculates the 1D DFT.
    Dct2d
    This class provides the functionality for calculating the DCT in 2D.
    Dct2d.Float  
    DctMatrixTest  
    Dft1d
    Interface specifying all one-dimensional DFT/FFT implementations.
    Dft1d Deprecated.
    Dft1d.Double  
    Dft1d.Float  
    Dft1dDirect
    Direct (slow) implementation of the 1-dimensional DFT using tabulated sine and cosine values.
    Dft1dDirect.Double
    One-dimensional DFT implementation using double precision data.
    Dft1dDirect.Float
    One-dimensional DFT implementation using single precision (float) data.
    Dft1dFast
    FFT (fast) implementation of the DFT, based on the JTransforms package by Piotr Wendykier (see https://github.com/wendykierp/JTransforms).
    Dft1dFast.Double
    One-dimensional FFT implementation using double precision data.
    Dft1dFast.Float
    One-dimensional FFT implementation using single precision (float) data.
    Dft2d
    Two-dimensional DFT implementation.
    Dft2d Deprecated.
    Dft2d.Double  
    Dft2d.Float  
    FourierDescriptor
    This is the abstract super-class for Fourier descriptors.
    FourierDescriptorFromPolygon
    Subclass of FourierDescriptor whose constructors assume that input polygons are non-uniformly sampled.
    FourierDescriptorUniform
    Subclass of FourierDescriptor whose constructors assume that input polygons are uniformly sampled.
    PolygonSampler  
    ScalingMode
    Scaling mode used for the DFT.
